CustomField.formula:
IF(isPartnerOpportunity__c ,DATE( YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))+1, MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)), DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) ),
( IF( Amount <150000,
DATE( IF( (MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) < 7),
YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)), YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) + 1 ),
IF((MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) < 7),
((MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) )+6)),
(6 - (12 - MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))) ),
IF(
AND( DAY(DATEVALUE (CreatedDate)) = 31, OR( MONTH(DATEVALUE (CreatedDate)) = 3, MONTH(DATEVALUE (CreatedDate)) = 5, MONTH(DATEVALUE (CreatedDate)) = 10, MONTH(DATEVALUE (CreatedDate)) = 12 ) ), 30,
IF( AND( DAY(DATEVALUE (CreatedDate)) > 28, MONTH(DATEVALUE (CreatedDate)) = 8),
28, DAY(DATEVALUE (CreatedDate))) )
),
null) ) )
CustomField.label: Deal Expiration Date
